ygData.subject: Forming fellowships
ygData.msgSnippet: Just wondered if anyone has worked in a group of all one class? Kinda been wondering about getting a group of Halfling Druids together to tackle the elementals
ygData.messageBody:
Just wondered if anyone has worked in a group of all one class? Kinda
been wondering about getting a group of Halfling Druids together to
tackle the elementals on the island in the Twilight Sea. Plenty of
power for ports, defeating summond creatures, and healing.

Thought of one as primary porter and evac officer, and back-up
healer. At least two to dismiss summond, and at least one dedicated
healer. Seems that a group like this should be able to kill quickly
and keep mana up enough to continue doing so for some time.

Any thoughts on this?

Barto Proudfoot
